name: Onwards and Upwards
description:
Version 0.9.1

Entry for #LowRezJam 2016 (64 x 64 resolution)

4 levels complete

W A S D - Movement

LMB - Fire

RMB - Aim

Space - Jump

1 2 3 - Equip Weapons (Battle Rifle, Burst Pistol, Machine Gun)

P - Restart Scene

Escape - Pause

[Tips]

  • Shoot Enemy lasers to shield yourself
  • Don't stop moving
  • Let your Blue Soldiers move ahead of you
  • Use the Battle Rifle (1) to shoot far away
  • Your Health regenerates
  • Press P to restart

Gameplay Video
